author: By MARI YAMAGUCHI Associated Press
title: Tokyo asks people to stay at home on weekend as cases rise
description: TOKYO (AP) — Tokyo asked its residents on Wednesday to stay home this weekend to slow the spread of the coronavirus after new daily cases in the Japanese capital rose to 41.
content:
TOKYO (AP) Tokyo asked its residents on Wednesday to stay home this weekend to slow the spread of the coronavirus after new daily cases in the Japanese capital rose to 41.
Tokyo Gov. Yuriko Koike said the city is on the verge of an explosive increase in infe… [+2248 chars]
